maparthelper.commands_list_2: §7/mart save hand [filename]§f — Save image from held map
maparthelper.commands_list_3: §7/mart save frame [filename]§f — Save image from item frame you're looking at
maparthelper.commands_list_4: §7/mart save selection [filename]§f — Save image from selected frames area
maparthelper.commands_list_5: §7/mart beams§f — Toggle visibility of beams at maps' starting positions
maparthelper.commands_list_6: §7/mart palette regenerate§f — Regenerate blocks palette and update complete_palette.json
maparthelper.commands_list_7: §7/mart palette update§f — Update palette and presets from the config files
maparthelper.is_holding_filled_map: Make sure you are holding a filled map
maparthelper.is_looking_at_frame_with_ma: Make sure you are looking at an item frame with a filled map
maparthelper.pos_selecting: Select two points with LMB and RMB
maparthelper.stop_selecting: Type the command again to cancel the selection
maparthelper.selecting_succeeded: Selection succeeded. Type /mart save selection <filename> to save
maparthelper.mapart_saved: The mapart successfully saved to the "saved_maps" folder as "%s"
maparthelper.selection_not_flat: Selection isn't flat. Choose another point
maparthelper.selection_has_no_maps: Selection contains no item frame with a filled map
maparthelper.selection_required: First, select an area using /mart save selection
maparthelper.selection_has_empty_places: Some item frames in the selection are absent or without a filled map
maparthelper.too_many_maps: The area is too large. Maximum size is 300 blocks
maparthelper.saving_error: An error occurred during saving the mapart. Check logs for details
maparthelper.saving_path_error: Provided file saving path is invalid. Make sure the filename is valid
maparthelper.nbt_file_saved: NBT file of the mapart "%s" was successfully saved to the folder "%s"
maparthelper.nbt_files_saved: %d NBT files of the mapart "%s" were successfully saved to the folder "%s" using the format "%2$s (x_y)"
maparthelper.nbt_zip_saved: %d NBT files of the mapart "%s" were successfully saved into the archive "%s" using the format "%2$s (x_y)"
maparthelper.gui.option.VALLEY_3D._TOOLT: Basic 3D style for building in survival
maparthelper.gui.option.WAVES_3D._TOOLTI: 3D mechanic style, very §cunoptimized §ffor building in survival
maparthelper.gui.drop_here_mapart: Drag an image file into the editor window to create a mapart
maparthelper.gui.useLAB_tooltip: Improves color matching. May slow down processing, so for medium and large maparts it's recommended to apply §cafter configuring other settings
maparthelper.gui.showInWorld_tooltip: Temporarily preview fake maps in the world
maparthelper.gui.saveZip: Save NBT in a ZIP archive
maparthelper.gui.enableColorAdaptation: Color adaptation is disabled or the image is missing
maparthelper.gui.color_without_block: This color is not in the current preset
maparthelper.gui.presets.updateFiles_too: Update the list and presets from files
text.autoconfig.mapart-helper.title: Mapart Helper
text.autoconfig.mapart-helper.option.com: Used for /mart save selection and /mart beams
Fake item frames display duration (in ticks)
Highlighting all occurrences of a specific block from the material list
Highlight color on preview when hovered
Which blocks will be used when generating the global palette
on the basis of which you can more easily adjust a custom palette,
§3To apply changes, regenerate the palette with /mart palette regenerate
This option is for informational purposes only.
Many of these blocks cannot even be placed or used
Only solid full blocks §c(Ignores the following)
Stairs, walls, fences, trapdoors, lanterns, candles, etc.
Corals and kelp have colors, but on maps the water color overlaps them
Saplings, bamboo and others may generate different blocks, breaking map colors
